org.apromore.plugin.impl

Class PluginRequestImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apromore.plugin.impl.PluginRequestImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginRequest

    public class PluginRequestImpl
extends Object
implements PluginRequest
    Default implementation of the PluginResult interface providing management of RequestPropertyType that are used by the consumer of a Plugin.
    Author:
    Felix Mannhardt (Bonn-Rhein-Sieg University oAS)

    • Method Detail

      • getRequestProperty

        public <T> PropertyType<T> getRequestProperty(PropertyType<T> pluginProperty)
                                   throws PluginPropertyNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: PluginRequest
        Get the current value for the given PropertyType in form of a PropertyType. Please not the returned PropertyType will usually just holding the value, all other methods may just return NULL.
        Specified by:
        getRequestProperty in interface PluginRequest
        Parameters:
        pluginProperty - that the Plugin defined
        Returns:
        PropertyType holding the request value
        Throws:
        PluginPropertyNotFoundException - if the property was not set and {link PropertyType.isMandatory() was true
